Name: Talesworth Adventure: The Lost Artifacts
About the game: Talesworth Adventure is a challenging, logic-based puzzle game that was originally launched on Kongregate. Use loot bags, one-way gates, and various other tools, to safely guide Questy through a maze of peril. Features Challenge yourself to go for gold on 33 mind-boggling maps Follow Questy on his journey to find the missing artifacts and defeat Boneyard. It's up to you to save Talesworth Kingdom! Lots of achievements to keep you busy Join the Discord to meet a fun and active community
